clues.category: THE AMERICAN MUSEUM OF NATURAL HISTORY
clues.clue: (Jon of the Clue Crew reads from the marble-columned rotunda of the American Museum of Natural History in New York.)  The rotunda is named after this U.S. president who collected specimens for the museum

clues.category: THE AMERICAN MUSEUM OF NATURAL HISTORY
clues.clue: (Jon of the Clue Crew reads underneath an ornamented hanging boat at the American Museum of Natural History in New York.)  This seaworthy 63-foot canoe was carved from a single tree trunk by the Haida, a native people from islands off this Canadian province

clues.category: THE AMERICAN MUSEUM OF NATURAL HISTORY

clues.category: THE AMERICAN MUSEUM OF NATURAL HISTORY
